definition: (astronomy) giant star/(fig.) superstar (of opera, basketball etc)

sentences.english: Let's go to the megastar's singing performance, shall we?
sentences.chinese: 我們去聽那個天王巨星的演唱會，好嗎？

sentences.english: Eventually, such a system will evolve further with the death of the remaining supergiant star.
sentences.chinese: 最終這樣的系統會進一步演化到剩餘巨星的死亡。

sentences.english: Ready to put him into a new generation of stars instead of Mollys article.
sentences.chinese: 準備把他捧成新一代的巨星代替莫利文。

sentences.english: So, the superstar we chose in the next generation is the last legal ANDROSTANE.
sentences.chinese: 因此，我們選擇的超級巨星在下一代是最後法律雄。

sentences.english: Mmmm, in fact , it's the fundation of all of a superstar.
sentences.chinese: 嗯，事實上，這是一名巨星各面成長的基礎。

sentences.english: The brightest reddish stars in the cluster are ancient red giants.
sentences.chinese: 星團中最明亮的微紅色恆星是遠古的紅巨星。

sentences.english: Winds and radiation from these stars create the complex structures seen in the gas throughout the image.
sentences.chinese: 來自巨星的輻射和恆星風創造了圖中複雜的氣體結構。

sentences.english: Li Bai, the superstar of poetry circles in Tang Dynasty, is deeply impressed by Taoism.
sentences.chinese: 唐代詩壇巨星李白，受道家思想影響甚深。

sentences.english: Mr Prahalad’s work on strategy and innovation turned him into a superstar.
sentences.chinese: 普拉哈拉德對戰略和創新的研究讓他成爲超級巨星。

sentences.english: McGrady became a star that year.
sentences.chinese: 在那一年，麥迪成爲了一位巨星。

sentences.english: Do not date anyone exclusively unless he or she is an A-list performer whose talent is unquestionable.
sentences.chinese: 不要這個一個人約會，除非他一個有絕對才華的巨星。

sentences.english: Meanwhile Malachy had arisen like another star in the North.
sentences.chinese: 與此同時，瑪拉基象又一顆巨星一樣升起在北方。

sentences.english: Being a multi-selling megastar hasn't always been mass adoration and adulation.
sentences.chinese: 作爲多產的巨星並不總是有大衆崇拜和諂媚。

sentences.english: At 22, he is a marketing megastar.
Both superstars are set to test the free agent market in the next offseason.
sentences.chinese: 這兩位超級巨星將引領着未來夏天的自由球員市場。

sentences.english: Superstar Mahi Arora has the world at her feet for a bit.
sentences.chinese: 超級巨星瑪西曾讓世界拜倒在她的腳下。

definition: currently popular (of movie stars, singers etc)
